Black Bean Dip
200g dried black beans
1 bay leaf
1 tsp salt
3 cloves garlic
1/2 an onion
1 large bunch of coriander
40ml lime juice
30g sour cream
3 chipotle chile in adobo
1 tsp. ground cumin
1/4 tsp. red chili powder
1/2 tsp. smoked paprika
30ml olive oil
15ml water
  1. Simmer the black beans for about 2 hours until tender with 1 liter of water, 1 bay leaf, 1 garlic clove, 1 tsp salt
  2. Blend everything. A lot of stop/start and pushing stuff down is needed. A bit more water can be added to help.
  3. Add salt if needed
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
